import { useSWRPmc } from '@/hooks/swr/useSWRPmc';
import { $PARAM_TYPES, $RESPONSE_TYPES } from '@/types/$MODULE_NAME/$FILE_NAME';
$API_IMPORT
import { ResponseData } from '@/utils/apiService/types';
import { SWRConfiguration } from 'swr';

export const $HOOK_NAME = (
  params: $PARAM_TYPES,
  options?: SWRConfiguration<ResponseData<$RESPONSE_TYPES>>
) => 
  useSWRPmc(
    params ? { key: '$HOOK_NAME', params } : null,
    async ({ params }) => await $FUNCTION_NAME({ payload: params }),
    options
  );
